posts.title: üîä 1.0.1 Patch Note
posts.body:
Gogo Racing Patch Notes

1.0.1 Patch Note

‚ö° Revision was made on Product category, so expired products can't be install anymore.

‚ö° After purchasing fixed-term items, the expiration display has been modified to be displayed when the expiration date expires.

‚ö° [Game Mode] It has been modified so that the sound is output when the back button is touched.

‚ö° [Garage] The vehicle name display length has been modified.

‚ö° Revised to remove expired characters and vehicles when updating inventory.

‚ö° Fixed the alignment of the character above the in-game and the name display that were misplaced.

‚ö° Added Tapjoy Shop Event icon and function.

‚ö° Fixed an issue where store alignment did not work properly.

‚ö° Modified the profile to expose character vehicle stats and skill information.

‚ö° [Garage] We modified the items that is currently installing so that they are aligned at the front.

‚ö° [Garage] If Players have more than one same paint, we have improved it to indicate the quantity on one item.

‚ö° [Option] We adjusted the size of the web view window considering the sizes of the device.

‚ö° [Option] Fix related to web view back Button issue

       ‚û°Ô∏è Add store data

       ‚û°Ô∏è Disable the Login Guest button

posts.title: üîä 1.0.2 Patch Note
posts.body:
Gogo Racing Patch Notes

1.0.2 Patch Note

Hello GoGo Racers!

üì¢ üì¢üì¢ We have an update today, March 25, 2022! As we want to give you an amazing game, here are detailed patch notes:

  • Fixed the type display on the paint and package in the purchase pop-up window.
  • Correct the alignment in Iteam League that applies to the same team when using EMP.
  • Activate the "Change Installation" button in the matching room.
  • Modified the alignment of track difficulty level of each league that was displayed differently.
  • Modified the text "cencel" ‚û°Ô∏è "cancel" in the system pop-up window
  • Altered the basic animation of the practice character.
  • Changed UI effects of results on the Time Attack Mode.
  • Upcoming new car and character added in the shop.
  • Correct the appearance of repeated acquisition when acquiring item boxes during Item League play
  • Ingame distance calculation UI, modify function to operate until end of game
  • Fixed the appearance that AI when the network is unstable.
  • Changed the display: Pop-up window will be removed when all attendance compensation is obtained
  • Established Account Linking on Google or Facebook Account.
  • Fixed the animation on the ranking profile.
    • üì± : You may download the game here: https://bit.ly/3JCuqTP
    • üåê: To know more about our games visit:https://linktr.ee/BSSPH

posts.title: üîä 1.0.3 Patch Note
posts.body:
Gogo Racing Patch Notes

1.0.3 Patch Note

Fix version informations:

  • Fixed incorrect game information version.
  • Modified game reward icon to appear differently when you lose the game.
  • Fixed vehicle change pop-up error in the matching room.
  • Added exception if the expired characters are installed.
  • Revised exception handling if the expired vehicle is installed.
  • Fixed sound setting: to prevent sound from coming out when the effect was turned off.
  • Fixed / Adjusted reward icon size.
  • Applied correction on the item acquisition effect when using magnetic field items.
  • Applied correction on turtle attack whereas the attack effect does not disappear when the shield is used.
  • Fixed Attendance Reward Pop-up.
  • Languages:
    • Added 7 new text translations: Japanese, Indonesian, Vietnamese, Thai, Spanish, French, and Italian.
    • Unavailable language is locked for processing.
    • Fixed issue where language is set automatically when the user moved to the lobby

posts.title: üîä 1.0.4 Patch Note
posts.body:
Gogo Racing Patch Notes

1.0.4 Patch Note

Hello GoGo Racers!

üì¢üì¢üì¢ We have an update today, June 14, 2022! As we want to give you an amazing and exciting game, here are detailed patch notes:

‚öôÔ∏è Unveiled a new character, a strict and arrogant chick named Bbi

‚öôÔ∏è Added new cars, one is small and cute car called Minimi and a special car called Speedstar.

‚öôÔ∏è Added six (6) new tracks:

 ‚û°Ô∏è GoGo Stadium

 ‚û°Ô∏è New Town

  ‚û°Ô∏è Lost Temple

  ‚û°Ô∏è Western Town

  ‚û°Ô∏è Clock Tower

  ‚û°Ô∏è Space City

‚öôÔ∏è GoGo Racing has a total of 14 tracks as of the moment.

‚öôÔ∏è Modified the packages on the shop. Items for each packages are already visible with images.

‚öôÔ∏è Added a lobby chat

‚öôÔ∏è Added a gacha system on the game.

‚öôÔ∏è Added a Victory box on the lobby which can be obtained by getting 10 trophies.

‚öôÔ∏è Added a Free box on the lobby that can be received every four (4) hours.

‚öôÔ∏è Improved the performance and animations of the game.

‚öôÔ∏è Improved the UI of the game.

‚öôÔ∏è Fixed the bugs on the game.
